import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T
from enum import Enum

sql_enable_path = 'abfss://sql-hub-logs-v2@hubautomation.dfs.core.windows.net/LATEST-AHUB-Deployment.csv'
sql_disable_path = 'abfss://sql-hub-logs-v2@hubautomation.dfs.core.windows.net/LATEST-AHUB-Removal.csv'
vm_enable_path = f'abfss://win-hub-logs-v2@hubautomation.dfs.core.windows.net/LATEST-AHUB-Deployment.csv'
vm_disable_path = f'abfss://win-hub-logs-v2@hubautomation.dfs.core.windows.net/LATEST-AHUB-Removal.csv'

csv_options = {
    'header' : True,
    'delimiter' : ',',
    'quote' : '"',
    'escape' : '"'
}

sql_enable_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(sql_enable_path)
sql_disable_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(sql_disable_path)
vm_enable_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(vm_enable_path)
vm_disable_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(vm_disable_path)

sql_enable_df = sql_enable_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'SubscriptionId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SQLAHB_VCPUs') \
    .withColumnRenamed('SQLAHB_VCPUs', 'NormalizedCores') \
    .withColumn('DeploymentStatus', F.lit(DeploymentStatus.Enabled.value)) \
    .withColumn('DeploymentType', F.lit(DeploymentType.SQL.value))

sql_disable_df = sql_disable_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'SubscriptionId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SQLAHB_VCPUs') \
    .withColumnRenamed('SQLAHB_VCPUs', 'NormalizedCores') \
    .withColumn('DeploymentStatus', F.lit(DeploymentStatus.Disabled.value)) \
    .withColumn('DeploymentType', F.lit(DeploymentType.SQL.value))

vm_enable_df = vm_enable_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'SubscriptionId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'WindowsAHB_VCPUs') \
    .withColumnRenamed('WindowsAHB_VCPUs', 'NormalizedCores') \
    .withColumn('DeploymentStatus', F.lit(DeploymentStatus.Enabled.value)) \
    .withColumn('DeploymentType', F.lit(DeploymentType.VM.value))

vm_disable_df = vm_disable_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'SubscriptionId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'WindowsAHB_VCPUs') \
    .withColumnRenamed('WindowsAHB_VCPUs', 'NormalizedCores') \
    .withColumn('DeploymentStatus', F.lit(DeploymentStatus.Disabled.value)) \
    .withColumn('DeploymentType', F.lit(DeploymentType.VM.value))

ahb_deployments_df = sql_enable_df.union(sql_disable_df).union(vm_enable_df).union(vm_disable_df)
ahb_deployments_df = ahb_deployments_df.withColumn('NormalizedCores', F.col('NormalizedCores').cast(T.IntegerType()))
ahb_deployments_df = ahb_deployments_df.withColumn('Date', F.col('Date').cast(T.DateType()))
